name: House Plant Simulator
description:
Welcome to House Plant Simulator!

The goal: add as many plants to your house as possible! Each plant you have in your house will earn you more "Plant Points" to buy more plants and make your space even more beautiful. 

Controls:

WASD - Move

F - Pick Up/Drop Plants

C - Water Plants / Fill Up Watering Can (at faucet)

E - View Plant Information

R/T/MouseWheel - Zoom In/Out

Q - Open Plant Shop

You will start the game with a single plant. New plants can be purchased with plant points at the shop (Q). Each plant is unique and has different needs.

Plants earn points when they are happy! 

Plants are not happy if they have an icon above them indicating they need something. 

Sun Icon = Needs Sun

Fire Icon = Too Hot + Needs Shade

Water Icon = Plant is thirsty.
